title: I have many referred friends over lvl ten, am i entitled to a recruiter badge in the boards?
body:
As the link stats, you need your support ticket in before Oct 10 2015.

I'v had mine in since Oct 1st 2015.  I have posted an image with other summoners with the recruiter badge. (In the support ticket of course). Not on the boards obviously.
i know this might be minor to some, but over the years I have spent alot of time introducing people to the game, some like some not so much, but have convinced them to give them a go. 
Can you please help me on this riot?
I have been playing for a very long time and although am not that good will one day get better (I hope). Even if it takes me 10 years.
